## About this app

This software was developed for the Archéosciences Bordeaux (former IRAMAT-CRP2A), Université Bordeaux Montaigne (France)
to analyse Al<sub>2</sub>O<sub>3</sub>:C chip measurements. The analysis assumed that the measurements
were solely carried out as described in Kreutzer et al. (2018). 
For all calculations functions from the R package 'Luminescence' are used. 

**Version**: 0.1.12 [2022-04-14]

**Author**: Sebastian Kreutzer, Archéosciences Bordeaux, UMR 6034, CNRS - Université Bordeaux Montaigne (France)

**Contact**: sebastian.kreutzer@u-bordeaux-montaigne.fr

**Bug reporting**: [https://github.com/crp2a/Al2O3_AnalysisApp/issues](https://github.com/crp2a/Al2O3_AnalysisApp/issues)
